hero.title: About
hero.tagline: AI Engineer · Prompt Strategist · Web Delivery
hero.summary: I blend AI experimentation with product-ready web delivery. The goal: design systems that can be evaluated, respect privacy, and leave room for rapid iteration.

story.heading: Personal Story
paragraphs: It started with small GPT-2 experiments—seeing how precise prompts reshape output quality. That curiosity grew into playbooks for creators, founders, and product teams to use AI responsibly.

My role is translating between business intent and machines. I design conversational frameworks, AI agents, and interfaces that ship. The core principles stay the same: clear goals, safe data, fast iteration.

items.title: Discovering prompt engineering
items.description: Tinkered with GPT and Stable Diffusion for community content; started cataloging reusable prompt patterns.

items.title: Building internal playbooks
items.description: Created frameworks that helped creative teams adopt AI for research, writing, and visual production.

items.title: Shipping lightweight web delivery
items.description: Combined AI experiments with Next.js/Astro delivery: responsive sites, dynamic content, and AI API integrations.

items.title: Agent orchestration focus
items.description: Designed multi-step AI agents for research and content ops, plus documentation that scales across teams.

clusters.title: AI Stack
clusters.description: Prompt design, light fine-tuning, agent orchestration, and output evaluation.

clusters.title: Web Delivery
clusters.description: Landing pages, lightweight dashboards, and API integrations with performance in mind.

clusters.title: Productivity
clusters.description: Collaboration and automation for daily work.

items.title: Clarity
items.body: Every collaboration starts with shared goals, boundaries, and success criteria.

items.title: Speed
items.body: Iterate quickly: prototype → feedback → refine. Focus on utility that lands today.

items.title: Safety
items.body: Safeguard data, anonymize sensitive inputs, and document the process.

items.name: Next collaborator
items.quote: Testimonials will be published after the next shipped project.
